1.初始信息
合约原文:
pragma solidity ^0.5.17;

contract Helloworld {
    int256 i = 0;
    address g_addr;
    
    //int256 --------------------------------
    function add(int a) public
    {
        i = i+a;
    }
    
    function geti() public view returns(int256)
    {
        return i;
    }
    
    //address --------------------------------
    function setaddr(address addr) public
    {
        g_addr = addr;
    }
    
    function getaddrbalance() public view returns(uint)
    {
        return g_addr.balance;
    }
    
}

GasLimit:3000000
GasPrice:1
